queryMap.query: SELECT /* tbeb_mot_recd_accu_sum_fb010 모터성적 조회 */ DISTINCT(TA .RACER_NO) RACER_NO , TA .NM_KOR , TA .MOT_NO -- 모터번호 , SUBSTR(TA .MOT_NO, 6, 3) VIEW_MOT_NO -- 모터번호 , TMRAS.RUN_CNT -- 출전회수 , TMRAS.RACE_CNT -- 출주횟수 , TMRAS.RACE_DAY_CNT -- 출전일수 , TMRAS.RANK_1_CNT -- 1착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_2_CNT -- 2착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_3_CNT -- 3착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_4_CNT -- 4착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_5_CNT -- 5착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_6_CNT -- 6착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_7_CNT -- 7착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_8_CNT -- 8착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_1_CNT + TMRAS.RANK_2_CNT RANK_12_CNT , TMRAS.AMU_RANK_SCR -- 누적착순점 , TMRAS.AVG_RANK_SCR -- 평균착순점 , TMRAS.WIN_RATIO -- 연간승률 , TMRAS.HIGH_RANK_RATIO -- 연대율 , TMRAS.HIGH_3_RANK_RATIO -- 3연대율 , TMRAS.TMS_3_ITRDT_RUN_TM -- 3회 소개 타임 , TMRAS.AVG_ITRDT_RUN_TM -- 평균 소개타임 , TMRAS.MAX_ITRDT_RUN_TM -- 최고소개타임 , TMRAS.MIN_ITRDT_RUN_TM -- 최소소개타임 , TMRAS.ITRDT_RUN_TM_DVTN -- 편차소개타임 , TMRAS.INST_ID -- 작성자ID , TMRAS.INST_DTM -- 작성일시 , TMRAS.UPDT_ID -- 수정자ID , TMRAS.UPDT_DTM -- 수정일시 , TMRAS.AVG_STRT_TM -- 평균 ST/OST , TA .DAY_ORD_1 , TA .DAY_ORD_2 , TA .DAY_ORD_3 , TA .DAY_ORD_4 , TA .DAY_ORD_5 , TA .DAY_ORD_6 , TA .DAY_ORD_7 FROM TBEF_EQUIP TE , ( SELECT MAS.RACER_NO , MAS.MOT_NO , TRM.NM_KOR , NVL(TOR.DAY_ORD_1, TA.DAY_ORD_1) DAY_ORD_1 , NVL(TOR.DAY_ORD_2, TA.DAY_ORD_2) DAY_ORD_2 , NVL(TOR.DAY_ORD_3, TA.DAY_ORD_3) DAY_ORD_3 , NVL(TOR.DAY_ORD_4, TA.DAY_ORD_4) DAY_ORD_4 , NVL(TOR.DAY_ORD_5, TA.DAY_ORD_5) DAY_ORD_5 , NVL(TOR.DAY_ORD_6, TA.DAY_ORD_6) DAY_ORD_6 , NVL(TOR.DAY_ORD_7, TA.DAY_ORD_7) DAY_ORD_7 FROM TBEC_RACER_MASTER TRM , ( SELECT TA.RACER_NO , TA.MOT_NO FROM TBEB_ARRANGE TA WHERE TA .STND_YEAR = ? AND TA .MBR_CD = ? AND TA .TMS = ? AND TA .ST_MTHD_CD = DECODE(?, '000', ST_MTHD_CD, ?) UNION SELECT TOR.RACER_NO , TOR.MOT_NO FROM TBEB_ORGAN TOR WHERE TOR.STND_YEAR = ? AND TOR.MBR_CD = ? AND TOR.TMS = ? AND TOR.ST_MTHD_CD = DECODE(?, '000', ST_MTHD_CD, ?) GROUP BY TOR.RACER_NO , TOR.MOT_NO ) MAS -- 출전 모터 , ( SELECT TOR.RACER_NO , TOR.MOT_NO , MIN(DECODE(TOR.DAY_ORD, 1, MOT_CNT)) DAY_ORD_1 , MIN(DECODE(TOR.DAY_ORD, 2, MOT_CNT)) DAY_ORD_2 , MIN(DECODE(TOR.DAY_ORD, 3, MOT_CNT)) DAY_ORD_3 , MIN(DECODE(TOR.DAY_ORD, 4, MOT_CNT)) DAY_ORD_4 , MIN(DECODE(TOR.DAY_ORD, 5, MOT_CNT)) DAY_ORD_5 , MIN(DECODE(TOR.DAY_ORD, 6, MOT_CNT)) DAY_ORD_6 , MIN(DECODE(TOR.DAY_ORD, 7, MOT_CNT)) DAY_ORD_7 FROM ( SELECT TOR.STND_YEAR , TOR.MBR_CD , TOR.TMS , TOR.DAY_ORD , TOR.RACER_NO , TOR.MOT_NO , COUNT(*) MOT_CNT FROM TBEB_ORGAN TOR WHERE TOR.STND_YEAR = ? AND TOR.MBR_CD = ? AND TOR.TMS = ? AND TOR.ST_MTHD_CD = DECODE(?, '000', ST_MTHD_CD, ?) GROUP BY TOR.STND_YEAR , TOR.MBR_CD , TOR.TMS , TOR.DAY_ORD , TOR.RACER_NO , TOR.MOT_NO ) TOR GROUP BY TOR.RACER_NO , TOR.MOT_NO ) TOR -- 실제 출주수 , ( SELECT TA .RACER_NO , TA .MOT_NO , MIN(DECODE(TRRA.DAY_ORD, 1, RACE_ALLOC_CNT)) DAY_ORD_1 , MIN(DECODE(TRRA.DAY_ORD, 2, RACE_ALLOC_CNT)) DAY_ORD_2 , MIN(DECODE(TRRA.DAY_ORD, 3, RACE_ALLOC_CNT)) DAY_ORD_3 , MIN(DECODE(TRRA.DAY_ORD, 4, RACE_ALLOC_CNT)) DAY_ORD_4 , MIN(DECODE(TRRA.DAY_ORD, 5, RACE_ALLOC_CNT)) DAY_ORD_5 , MIN(DECODE(TRRA.DAY_ORD, 6, RACE_ALLOC_CNT)) DAY_ORD_6 , MIN(DECODE(TRRA.DAY_ORD, 7, RACE_ALLOC_CNT)) DAY_ORD_7 FROM TBEB_ARRANGE TA , TBEB_RACER_RACE_ALLOC TRRA WHERE TA .STND_YEAR = TRRA.STND_YEAR(+) AND TA .MBR_CD = TRRA.MBR_CD (+) AND TA .TMS = TRRA.TMS (+) AND TA .RACER_NO = TRRA.RACER_NO (+) AND TA .STND_YEAR = ? AND TA .MBR_CD = ? AND TA .TMS = ? AND TA .ST_MTHD_CD = DECODE(?, '000', ST_MTHD_CD, ?) GROUP BY TA .RACER_NO , TA .MOT_NO ) TA -- 배정된 출주수 WHERE MAS.RACER_NO = TOR.RACER_NO(+) AND MAS.MOT_NO = TOR.MOT_NO (+) AND MAS.RACER_NO = TA .RACER_NO(+) AND MAS.MOT_NO = TA .MOT_NO (+) AND MAS.RACER_NO = TRM.RACER_NO ) TA , ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY TMRAS.MOT_NO ORDER BY TMRAS.STND_YEAR DESC , TMRAS.TMS DESC ) RANK , TMRAS.* FROM TBEB_MOT_RECD_ACCU_SUM TMRAS WHERE TMRAS.MBR_CD = ? AND TMRAS.STND_YEAR || LPAD(TMRAS.TMS, 3, '0') <= ? || LPAD(?, 3, '0') AND TMRAS.ST_MTHD_CD = ? ) WHERE RANK = 1 ) TMRAS -- 모터 최근 성적 WHERE TE.EQUIP_NO = TA .MOT_NO AND TE.EQUIP_NO = TMRAS.MOT_NO(+) AND TE.MBR_CD = ? AND TE.EQUIP_TPE_CD = 'M' AND TE.EQUIP_NO LIKE '%' || NVL(?, TE.EQUIP_NO) || '%' ORDER BY TA.RACER_NO

SELECT /* tbeb_mot_recd_accu_sum_fb011 모터성적(전체) 조회 */ DISTINCT(TMRAS.STND_YEAR) STND_YEAR -- 기준년도 , TMRAS.MBR_CD -- 경정장코드 , TMRAS.TMS -- 회차 , TE.EQUIP_NO MOT_NO -- 모터번호 , SUBSTR(TE.EQUIP_NO, 6, 3) VIEW_MOT_NO -- 모터번호 , TMRAS.RUN_CNT -- 출전회수 , TMRAS.RACE_CNT -- 출주횟수 , TMRAS.RACE_DAY_CNT -- 출전일수 , TMRAS.RANK_1_CNT -- 1착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_2_CNT -- 2착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_3_CNT -- 3착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_4_CNT -- 4착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_5_CNT -- 5착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_6_CNT -- 6착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_7_CNT -- 7착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_8_CNT -- 8착회수 , TMRAS.AMU_RANK_SCR -- 누적착순점 , TMRAS.AVG_RANK_SCR -- 평균착순점 , TMRAS.WIN_RATIO -- 연간승률 , TMRAS.HIGH_RANK_RATIO -- 연대율 , TMRAS.HIGH_3_RANK_RATIO -- 3연대율 , TMRAS.TMS_3_ITRDT_RUN_TM -- 3회 소개 타임 , TMRAS.AVG_ITRDT_RUN_TM -- 평균 소개타임 , TMRAS.MAX_ITRDT_RUN_TM -- 최고소개타임 , TMRAS.MIN_ITRDT_RUN_TM -- 최소소개타임 , TMRAS.ITRDT_RUN_TM_DVTN -- 편차소개타임 , TMRAS.INST_ID -- 작성자ID , TMRAS.INST_DTM -- 작성일시 , TMRAS.UPDT_ID -- 수정자ID , TMRAS.UPDT_DTM -- 수정일시 , TMRAS.AVG_STRT_TM -- 평균 ST/OST FROM TBEF_EQUIP TE , ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY TMRAS.MOT_NO ORDER BY TMRAS.STND_YEAR DESC , TMRAS.TMS DESC ) RANK , TMRAS.* FROM TBEB_MOT_RECD_ACCU_SUM TMRAS WHERE TMRAS.MBR_CD = ? AND TMRAS.ST_MTHD_CD = ? AND TMRAS.STND_YEAR || LPAD(TMRAS.TMS, 3, '0') <= ? || LPAD(?, 3, '0') ) WHERE RANK = 1 ) TMRAS WHERE TE.EQUIP_NO = TMRAS.MOT_NO(+) AND TE.STND_YEAR = ? AND TE.EQUIP_TPE_CD = 'M' AND TE.MBR_CD = ? AND TE.EQUIP_NO LIKE '%' || NVL(?, TE.EQUIP_NO) || '%' ORDER BY TE.EQUIP_NO

SELECT /* tbeb_mot_recd_accu_sum_fb012 모터성적 조회 */ DISTINCT(TMRAS.STND_YEAR) STND_YEAR -- 기준년도 , TMRAS.MBR_CD -- 경정장코드 , TMRAS.TMS -- 회차 , TE.EQUIP_NO MOT_NO -- 모터번호 , SUBSTR(TE.EQUIP_NO, 6, 3) VIEW_MOT_NO -- 모터번호 , TMRAS.RUN_CNT -- 출전회수 , TMRAS.RACE_CNT -- 출주횟수 , TMRAS.RACE_DAY_CNT -- 출전일수 , TMRAS.RANK_1_CNT -- 1착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_2_CNT -- 2착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_3_CNT -- 3착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_4_CNT -- 4착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_5_CNT -- 5착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_6_CNT -- 6착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_7_CNT -- 7착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_8_CNT -- 8착회수 , TMRAS.AMU_RANK_SCR -- 누적착순점 , TMRAS.AVG_RANK_SCR -- 평균착순점 , TMRAS.WIN_RATIO -- 연간승률 , TMRAS.HIGH_RANK_RATIO -- 연대율 , TMRAS.HIGH_3_RANK_RATIO -- 3연대율 , TMRAS.TMS_3_ITRDT_RUN_TM -- 3회 소개 타임 , TMRAS.AVG_ITRDT_RUN_TM -- 평균 소개타임 , TMRAS.MAX_ITRDT_RUN_TM -- 최고소개타임 , TMRAS.MIN_ITRDT_RUN_TM -- 최소소개타임 , TMRAS.ITRDT_RUN_TM_DVTN -- 편차소개타임 , TMRAS.INST_ID -- 작성자ID , TMRAS.INST_DTM -- 작성일시 , TMRAS.UPDT_ID -- 수정자ID , TMRAS.UPDT_DTM -- 수정일시 , TMRAS.AVG_STRT_TM -- 평균 ST/OST FROM TBEF_EQUIP TE , ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY TMRAS.MOT_NO ORDER BY TMRAS.STND_YEAR DESC , TMRAS.TMS DESC ) RANK , TMRAS.* FROM TBEB_MOT_RECD_ACCU_SUM TMRAS WHERE TMRAS.MBR_CD = ? AND TMRAS.ST_MTHD_CD = ? AND TMRAS.STND_YEAR || LPAD(TMRAS.TMS, 3, '0') <= ? || LPAD(?, 3, '0') ) WHERE RANK = 1 ) TMRAS WHERE TE.EQUIP_NO IN ( SELECT DISTINCT MOT_NO FROM ( SELECT TA.MOT_NO, ST_MTHD_CD FROM TBEB_ARRANGE TA WHERE TA.STND_YEAR = ? AND TA.MBR_CD = ? AND TA.TMS = ? AND MOT_NO LIKE '%' || NVL(?, MOT_NO) || '%'
UNION
SELECT TOR.MOT_NO, ST_MTHD_CD FROM TBEB_ORGAN TOR WHERE TOR.STND_YEAR = ? AND TOR.MBR_CD = ? AND TOR.TMS = ? AND MOT_NO LIKE '%' || NVL(?, MOT_NO) || '%' ) WHERE ST_MTHD_CD = ( CASE WHEN ? = '000' THEN ST_MTHD_CD ELSE ? END ) ) AND TE.EQUIP_NO = TMRAS.MOT_NO(+) AND TE.EQUIP_TPE_CD = 'M' AND TE.MBR_CD = ? ORDER BY TE.EQUIP_NO

SELECT /*tbeb_mot_recd_accu_sum_fb003 모터별최근성적조회*/ DISTINCT(TE.EQUIP_NO) MOT_NO -- 모터번호 , SUBSTR(TE.EQUIP_NO, 2, 4) STND_YEAR , SUBSTR(TE.EQUIP_NO, 6, 3) VIEW_MOT_NO -- 모터번호 , TMRAS.RUN_CNT -- 출전회수 , TMRAS.RACE_CNT -- 출주횟수 , TMRAS.RACE_DAY_CNT -- 출전일수 , TMRAS.RANK_1_CNT -- 1착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_2_CNT -- 2착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_3_CNT -- 3착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_4_CNT -- 4착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_5_CNT -- 5착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_6_CNT -- 6착회수 , TMRAS.AMU_RANK_SCR -- 누적착순점 , TMRAS.AVG_RANK_SCR -- 평균착순점 , TMRAS.WIN_RATIO -- 연간승률 , TMRAS.HIGH_RANK_RATIO -- 연대율 , TMRAS.HIGH_3_RANK_RATIO -- 3연대율 , TMRAS.TMS_3_ITRDT_RUN_TM -- 3회 소개 타임 , TMRAS.AVG_ITRDT_RUN_TM -- 평균 소개타임 , TMRAS.MAX_ITRDT_RUN_TM -- 최고소개타임 , TMRAS.MIN_ITRDT_RUN_TM -- 최소소개타임 , TMRAS.ITRDT_RUN_TM_DVTN -- 편차소개타임 , TMRAS.INST_ID -- 작성자ID , TMRAS.INST_DTM -- 작성일시 , TMRAS.UPDT_ID -- 수정자ID , TMRAS.UPDT_DTM -- 수정일시 , TMRAS.AVG_STRT_TM -- 평균 ST/OST FROM TBEF_EQUIP TE , ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY TMRAS.MOT_NO ORDER BY TMRAS.STND_YEAR DESC , TMRAS.TMS DESC ) RANK , TMRAS.* FROM TBEB_MOT_RECD_ACCU_SUM TMRAS WHERE TMRAS.MBR_CD = ? AND TMRAS.STND_YEAR || LPAD(TMRAS.TMS, 3, '0') <= ? || LPAD(?, 3, '0') ) WHERE RANK = 1 ) TMRAS WHERE TE.EQUIP_NO = TMRAS.MOT_NO(+) AND TE.EQUIP_TPE_CD = 'M' AND TE.EQUIP_NO IN ( SELECT MOT_NO FROM TBEB_ORGAN WHERE STND_YEAR = ? AND MBR_CD = ? AND TMS <= ? GROUP BY MOT_NO ) ORDER BY SUBSTR(TE.EQUIP_NO, 2, 4) DESC , TE.EQUIP_NO

SELECT /* tbeb_mot_weath_fb001 모터 성적 조회 */ DISTINCT(TA .RACER_NO) RACER_NO , TA .NM_KOR , TA .MOT_NO -- 모터번호 , SUBSTR(TA .MOT_NO, 6, 3) VIEW_MOT_NO -- 모터번호 , TMRAS.RUN_CNT -- 출전회수 , TMRAS.RACE_CNT -- 출주횟수 , TMRAS.RACE_DAY_CNT -- 출전일수 , TMRAS.RANK_1_CNT -- 1착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_2_CNT -- 2착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_3_CNT -- 3착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_4_CNT -- 4착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_5_CNT -- 5착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_6_CNT -- 6착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_7_CNT -- 7착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_8_CNT -- 8착회수 , TMRAS.RANK_1_CNT + TMRAS.RANK_2_CNT RANK_12_CNT , TMRAS.AMU_RANK_SCR -- 누적착순점 , TMRAS.AVG_RANK_SCR -- 평균착순점 , TMRAS.WIN_RATIO -- 연간승률 , TMRAS.HIGH_RANK_RATIO -- 연대율 , TMRAS.HIGH_3_RANK_RATIO -- 3연대율 , TMRAS.AVG_ITRDT_RUN_TM -- 평균 소개타임 , TMRAS.MAX_ITRDT_RUN_TM -- 최고소개타임 , TMRAS.MIN_ITRDT_RUN_TM -- 최소소개타임 , TMRAS.ITRDT_RUN_TM_DVTN -- 편차소개타임 , TMRAS.AVG_STRT_TM -- 평균 ST/OST , TA .DAY_ORD_1 , TA .DAY_ORD_2 , TA .DAY_ORD_3 , TA .DAY_ORD_4 , TA .DAY_ORD_5 , TA .DAY_ORD_6 , TA .DAY_ORD_7 FROM TBEF_EQUIP TE , ( SELECT MAS.RACER_NO , MAS.MOT_NO , TRM.NM_KOR , NVL(TOR.DAY_ORD_1, TA.DAY_ORD_1) DAY_ORD_1 , NVL(TOR.DAY_ORD_2, TA.DAY_ORD_2) DAY_ORD_2 , NVL(TOR.DAY_ORD_3, TA.DAY_ORD_3) DAY_ORD_3 , NVL(TOR.DAY_ORD_4, TA.DAY_ORD_4) DAY_ORD_4 , NVL(TOR.DAY_ORD_5, TA.DAY_ORD_5) DAY_ORD_5 , NVL(TOR.DAY_ORD_6, TA.DAY_ORD_6) DAY_ORD_6 , NVL(TOR.DAY_ORD_7, TA.DAY_ORD_7) DAY_ORD_7 FROM TBEC_RACER_MASTER TRM , ( SELECT TA.RACER_NO , TA.MOT_NO FROM TBEB_ARRANGE TA WHERE TA .STND_YEAR = ? AND TA .MBR_CD = ? AND TA .TMS = ? AND TA .ST_MTHD_CD= DECODE(?, '000', ST_MTHD_CD, ?) UNION SELECT TOR.RACER_NO , TOR.MOT_NO FROM TBEB_ORGAN TOR WHERE TOR.STND_YEAR = ? AND TOR.MBR_CD = ? AND TOR.TMS = ? AND TOR.ST_MTHD_CD= DECODE(?, '000', ST_MTHD_CD, ?) GROUP BY TOR.RACER_NO , TOR.MOT_NO ) MAS -- 출전 선수/모터 , ( SELECT TOR.RACER_NO , TOR.MOT_NO , MIN(DECODE(TOR.DAY_ORD, 1, MOT_CNT)) DAY_ORD_1 , MIN(DECODE(TOR.DAY_ORD, 2, MOT_CNT)) DAY_ORD_2 , MIN(DECODE(TOR.DAY_ORD, 3, MOT_CNT)) DAY_ORD_3 , MIN(DECODE(TOR.DAY_ORD, 4, MOT_CNT)) DAY_ORD_4 , MIN(DECODE(TOR.DAY_ORD, 5, MOT_CNT)) DAY_ORD_5 , MIN(DECODE(TOR.DAY_ORD, 6, MOT_CNT)) DAY_ORD_6 , MIN(DECODE(TOR.DAY_ORD, 7, MOT_CNT)) DAY_ORD_7 FROM ( SELECT TOR.STND_YEAR , TOR.MBR_CD , TOR.TMS , TOR.DAY_ORD , TOR.RACER_NO , TOR.MOT_NO , COUNT(*) MOT_CNT FROM TBEB_ORGAN TOR WHERE TOR.STND_YEAR = ? AND TOR.MBR_CD = ? AND TOR.TMS = ? AND TOR.ST_MTHD_CD= DECODE(?, '000', ST_MTHD_CD, ?) GROUP BY TOR.STND_YEAR , TOR.MBR_CD , TOR.TMS , TOR.DAY_ORD , TOR.RACER_NO , TOR.MOT_NO ) TOR GROUP BY TOR.RACER_NO , TOR.MOT_NO ) TOR -- 실제 출주수 , ( SELECT TA .RACER_NO , TA .MOT_NO , MIN(DECODE(TRRA.DAY_ORD, 1, RACE_ALLOC_CNT)) DAY_ORD_1 , MIN(DECODE(TRRA.DAY_ORD, 2, RACE_ALLOC_CNT)) DAY_ORD_2 , MIN(DECODE(TRRA.DAY_ORD, 3, RACE_ALLOC_CNT)) DAY_ORD_3 , MIN(DECODE(TRRA.DAY_ORD, 4, RACE_ALLOC_CNT)) DAY_ORD_4 , MIN(DECODE(TRRA.DAY_ORD, 5, RACE_ALLOC_CNT)) DAY_ORD_5 , MIN(DECODE(TRRA.DAY_ORD, 6, RACE_ALLOC_CNT)) DAY_ORD_6 , MIN(DECODE(TRRA.DAY_ORD, 7, RACE_ALLOC_CNT)) DAY_ORD_7 FROM TBEB_ARRANGE TA , TBEB_RACER_RACE_ALLOC TRRA WHERE TA .STND_YEAR = TRRA.STND_YEAR(+) AND TA .MBR_CD = TRRA.MBR_CD (+) AND TA .TMS = TRRA.TMS (+) AND TA .RACER_NO = TRRA.RACER_NO (+) AND TA .STND_YEAR = ? AND TA .MBR_CD = ? AND TA .TMS = ? AND TA .ST_MTHD_CD= DECODE(?, '000', TA.ST_MTHD_CD, ?) GROUP BY TA .RACER_NO , TA .MOT_NO ) TA -- 배정된 출주수 WHERE MAS.RACER_NO = TOR.RACER_NO(+) AND MAS.MOT_NO = TOR.MOT_NO (+) AND MAS.RACER_NO = TA .RACER_NO(+) AND MAS.MOT_NO = TA .MOT_NO (+) AND MAS.RACER_NO = TRM.RACER_NO ) TA , ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY TMRAS.MOT_NO ORDER BY TMRAS.STND_YEAR DESC , TMRAS.TMS DESC ) RANK , TMRAS.* FROM ( SELECT ? STND_YEAR , ? MBR_CD , ? TMS , TE .EQUIP_NO MOT_NO , SUBSTR(TE .EQUIP_NO, 6, 3) VIEW_MOT_NO , YEAR .RUN_CNT RUN_CNT , YEAR .RACE_CNT RACE_CNT , YEAR .RACE_DAY_CNT RACE_DAY_CNT , YEAR .RANK_1 RANK_1_CNT , YEAR .RANK_2 RANK_2_CNT , YEAR .RANK_3 RANK_3_CNT , YEAR .RANK_4 RANK_4_CNT , YEAR .RANK_5 RANK_5_CNT , YEAR .RANK_6 RANK_6_CNT , YEAR .RANK_7 RANK_7_CNT , YEAR .RANK_8 RANK_8_CNT , YEAR .AMU_RANK_SCR AMU_RANK_SCR , YEAR .AVG_RANK_SCR AVG_RANK_SCR , YEAR .AVG_STAR_TM AVG_STRT_TM , TRIM(TO_CHAR((YEAR .RANK_1) / YEAR .RACE_CNT * 100, 990.9)) WIN_RATIO , TRIM(TO_CHAR((YEAR .RANK_1 + YEAR .RANK_2) / YEAR .RACE_CNT * 100, 990.9)) HIGH_RANK_RATIO , TRIM(TO_CHAR((YEAR .RANK_1 + YEAR .RANK_2 + YEAR .RANK_3) / YEAR .RACE_CNT * 100, 990.9)) HIGH_3_RANK_RATIO , MOT .AVG_ITRDT_RUN_TM AVG_ITRDT_RUN_TM , MOT .MAX_ITRDT_RUN_TM MAX_ITRDT_RUN_TM , MOT .MIN_ITRDT_RUN_TM MIN_ITRDT_RUN_TM , MOT .ITRDT_RUN_TM_DVTN ITRDT_RUN_TM_DVTN FROM TBEF_EQUIP TE , ( -- 년도별 성적 SELECT MOT_NO , COUNT(DISTINCT(TOR.STND_YEAR || TOR.MBR_CD || TOR.TMS)) RUN_CNT , COUNT(DISTINCT(TOR.STND_YEAR || TOR.MBR_CD || TOR.TMS || TOR.DAY_ORD)) RACE_DAY_CNT , COUNT(*) RACE_CNT , SUM(DECODE(TOR.RANK, 1, 1, 0)) RANK_1 , SUM(DECODE(TOR.RANK, 2, 1, 0)) RANK_2 , SUM(DECODE(TOR.RANK, 3, 1, 0)) RANK_3 , SUM(DECODE(TOR.RANK, 4, 1, 0)) RANK_4 , SUM(DECODE(TOR.RANK, 5, 1, 0)) RANK_5 , SUM(DECODE(TOR.RANK, 6, 1, 0)) RANK_6 , SUM(DECODE(TOR.RANK, 7, 1, 0)) RANK_7 , SUM(DECODE(TOR.RANK, 8, 1, 0)) RANK_8 , SUM(TRS.RACE_SCR) AMU_RANK_SCR , TRIM(TO_CHAR(AVG(TRS.RACE_SCR), 90.99)) AVG_RANK_SCR , DECODE(?,'000', TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(DECODE(TOR.ST_MTHD_CD, '001', 0,TOR.STAR_TM))/NVL(SUM(DECODE(TOR.ST_MTHD_CD, '001', 0, 1)),1), 90.99)), TRIM(TO_CHAR(AVG(TOR.STAR_TM), 90.99)) ) AVG_STAR_TM FROM TBEB_ORGAN TOR , TBEB_RACE_TMS TRT , TBEB_RACE TR , TBEB_RANK_SCR TRS WHERE TOR .STND_YEAR = TR .STND_YEAR AND TOR .MBR_CD = TR .MBR_CD AND TOR .TMS = TR .TMS AND TOR .DAY_ORD = TR .DAY_ORD AND TOR .RACE_NO = TR .RACE_NO AND TOR .STND_YEAR = TRT .STND_YEAR AND TOR .MBR_CD = TRT .MBR_CD AND TOR .TMS = TRT .TMS AND TOR .STND_YEAR = TRS .STND_YEAR AND TR .RACE_DGRE_CD = TRS .RACE_DGRE_CD AND TOR .RANK = TRS .RANK AND TOR .ABSE_CD <> '003' AND TOR .IMMT_CLS_CD <> '003' AND TOR .MBR_CD = ? AND TOR .RACE_DAY <= ( SELECT MAX(TRDO.RACE_DAY) RACE_DAY FROM TBEB_RACE_DAY_ORD TRDO WHERE TRDO.STND_YEAR = ? AND TRDO.MBR_CD = ? AND TRDO.TMS = ? ) AND TR .WEATH_CD = NVL(?, TR .WEATH_CD) AND TOR .ST_MTHD_CD= DECODE(?, '000', TOR.ST_MTHD_CD, ?) GROUP BY MOT_NO ) YEAR , ( -- 평균소개타임 SELECT MOT_NO , TRIM(TO_CHAR(AVG(TOR.INTRO_RUN_TM) , 90.99)) AVG_ITRDT_RUN_TM , MAX(TOR.RACE_TM) MAX_ITRDT_RUN_TM , MIN(TOR.RACE_TM) MIN_ITRDT_RUN_TM , TRIM(TO_CHAR(STDDEV(TOR.INTRO_RUN_TM), 90.99)) ITRDT_RUN_TM_DVTN FROM TBEB_ORGAN TOR , TBEB_RACE TR WHERE TOR .STND_YEAR = TR .STND_YEAR AND TOR .MBR_CD = TR .MBR_CD AND TOR .TMS = TR .TMS AND TOR .DAY_ORD = TR .DAY_ORD AND TOR .RACE_NO = TR .RACE_NO AND TOR .MBR_CD = ? AND TOR .RACE_DAY <= ( SELECT MAX(TRDO.RACE_DAY) RACE_DAY FROM TBEB_RACE_DAY_ORD TRDO WHERE TRDO.STND_YEAR = ? AND TRDO.MBR_CD = ? AND TRDO.TMS = ? ) AND TR .WEATH_CD = NVL(?, TR .WEATH_CD) AND TOR .ST_MTHD_CD= DECODE(?, '000', TOR.ST_MTHD_CD, ?) GROUP BY MOT_NO ) MOT WHERE TE .EQUIP_TPE_CD = 'M' AND TE .EQUIP_NO = MOT .MOT_NO(+) AND TE .EQUIP_NO = YEAR .MOT_NO(+) AND MOT.MOT_NO IN ( SELECT TOR.MOT_NO FROM TBEB_ORGAN TOR WHERE TOR.STND_YEAR = ? AND TOR.MBR_CD = ? AND TOR.TMS = ? AND TOR.ST_MTHD_CD= DECODE(?, '000', TOR.ST_MTHD_CD, ?) ) ) TMRAS WHERE TMRAS.MBR_CD = ? AND TMRAS.STND_YEAR || LPAD(TMRAS.TMS, 3, '0') <= ? || LPAD(?, 3, '0') ) WHERE RANK = 1 ) TMRAS -- 모터 최근 성적 WHERE TE.EQUIP_NO = TA .MOT_NO AND TE.EQUIP_NO = TMRAS.MOT_NO(+) AND TE.MBR_CD = ? AND TE.EQUIP_TPE_CD = 'M' AND TE.EQUIP_NO LIKE '%' || NVL(?, TE.EQUIP_NO) || '%' ORDER BY TA.RACER_NO

SELECT /* tbeb_mot_weath_fb002 상세성적조회 */ TOR.STND_YEAR , TOR.MBR_CD , TOR.TMS , TOR.DAY_ORD , TOR.RACE_NO , TOR.RACE_REG_NO , TOR.RACER_NO , TOR.RACER_GRD_CD , TOR.ABSE_CD , TOR.MOT_NO , SUBSTR(TOR .MOT_NO, 6, 3) VIEW_MOT_NO -- 모터번호 , TOR.BOAT_NO , SUBSTR(TOR .BOAT_NO, 6, 3) VIEW_BOAT_NO -- 모터번호 , TOR.RANK , TOR.RACE_TM , TOR.TIME_DIFF , TOR.STRATEGY_CD , TOR.ENTRY_COURSE , TOR.STAR_TM , TOR.RMK , TOR.INTRO_RUN_TM , TOR.FLYING_CNT , TOR.LATE_CNT , TRM.NM_KOR , TOR.RACE_REG_NO || ' / ' || TOR.ENTRY_COURSE COURSE FROM TBEB_ORGAN TOR , TBEB_RACE TR , TBEC_RACER_MASTER TRM WHERE TOR.RACER_NO = TRM.RACER_NO AND TOR.STND_YEAR = TR .STND_YEAR AND TOR.MBR_CD = TR .MBR_CD AND TOR.TMS = TR .TMS AND TOR.DAY_ORD = TR .DAY_ORD AND TOR.RACE_NO = TR .RACE_NO AND TOR.MOT_NO = NVL(?, TOR.MOT_NO ) AND TOR.RACE_DAY <= ( SELECT MAX(TRDO.RACE_DAY) RACE_DAY FROM TBEB_RACE_DAY_ORD TRDO WHERE TRDO.STND_YEAR = ? AND TRDO.MBR_CD = ? AND TRDO.TMS = ? ) AND TOR.STND_YEAR IN (?, ? - 1) AND TR .WEATH_CD = NVL(?, TR .WEATH_CD) AND TOR.ST_MTHD_CD = ? ORDER BY TOR.RACE_DAY DESC , TOR.RACE_NO DESC

INSERT INTO TBEB_MOT_RECD_ACCU_SUM /* tbeb_mot_recd_accu_sum_ib001 모터최근성적입력 */ ( STND_YEAR -- 기준년도 , MBR_CD -- 경정장코드 , TMS -- 회차 , MOT_NO -- 모터번호 , RUN_CNT -- 출전회수 , RACE_CNT -- 출주횟수 , RACE_DAY_CNT -- 출전일수 , RANK_1_CNT -- 1착회수 , RANK_2_CNT -- 2착회수 , RANK_3_CNT -- 3착회수 , RANK_4_CNT -- 4착회수 , RANK_5_CNT -- 5착회수 , RANK_6_CNT -- 6착회수 , AMU_RANK_SCR -- 누적착순점 , AVG_RANK_SCR -- 평균착순점 , WIN_RATIO -- 연간승률 , HIGH_RANK_RATIO -- 연대율 , HIGH_3_RANK_RATIO -- 3연대율 , TMS_3_ITRDT_RUN_TM -- 3회 소개 타임 , AVG_ITRDT_RUN_TM -- 평균 소개타임 , MAX_ITRDT_RUN_TM -- 최고소개타임 , MIN_ITRDT_RUN_TM -- 최소소개타임 , ITRDT_RUN_TM_DVTN -- 편차소개타임 , INST_ID -- 작성자ID , INST_DTM -- 작성일시 , UPDT_ID -- 수정자ID , UPDT_DTM -- 수정일시 , ST_MTHD_CD -- ST구분 , AVG_STRT_TM -- 평균ST/OST ) VALUES ( ? -- 기준년도 , ? -- 경정장코드 , ? -- 회차 , ? -- 모터번호 , ? -- 출전회수 , ? -- 출주횟수 , ? -- 출전일수 , ? -- 1착회수 , ? -- 2착회수 , ? -- 3착회수 , ? -- 4착회수 , ? -- 5착회수 , ? -- 6착회수 , ? -- 누적착순점 , ? -- 평균착순점 , ? -- 연간승률 , ? -- 연대율 , ? -- 3연대율 , ? -- 3회 소개 타임 , ? -- 평균 소개타임 , ? -- 최고소개타임 , ? -- 최소소개타임 , ? -- 편차소개타임 , ? -- 작성자ID , SYSDATE -- 작성일시 , ? -- 수정자ID , SYSDATE -- 수정일시 , ? -- ST구분 , ? -- 평균ST/OST )

UPDATE TBEB_MOT_RECD_ACCU_SUM SET /* tbeb_mot_recd_accu_sum_ub001 모터최근성적수정 */ RUN_CNT = ? -- 출전회수 , RACE_CNT = ? -- 출주횟수 , RACE_DAY_CNT = ? -- 출전일수 , RANK_1_CNT = ? -- 1착회수 , RANK_2_CNT = ? -- 2착회수 , RANK_3_CNT = ? -- 3착회수 , RANK_4_CNT = ? -- 4착회수 , RANK_5_CNT = ? -- 5착회수 , RANK_6_CNT = ? -- 6착회수 , AMU_RANK_SCR = ? -- 누적착순점 , AVG_RANK_SCR = ? -- 평균착순점 , WIN_RATIO = ? -- 연간승률 , HIGH_RANK_RATIO = ? -- 연대율 , HIGH_3_RANK_RATIO = ? -- 3연대율 , TMS_3_ITRDT_RUN_TM = ? -- 3회 소개 타임 , AVG_ITRDT_RUN_TM = ? -- 평균 소개타임 , MAX_ITRDT_RUN_TM = ? -- 최고소개타임 , MIN_ITRDT_RUN_TM = ? -- 최소소개타임 , ITRDT_RUN_TM_DVTN = ? -- 편차소개타임 , UPDT_ID = ? -- 수정자ID , UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE -- 수정일시 , ST_MTHD_CD = ? -- ST구분 , AVG_STRT_TM = ? -- 평균ST/OST WHERE STND_YEAR = ? -- 기준년도 AND MBR_CD = ? -- 경정장코드 AND TMS = ? -- 회차 AND MOT_NO = ? -- 모터번호 AND ST_MTHD_CD = ? -- ST구분
